Module MailRegister
Package mappe.del3.addressregister.controll.MainController

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
mappe.del3.addressregister.controll.MainController.MainController
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
The main controller of the application. All mayor interactions (action events) from the GUI uses mainController methods.
Version:
2021-05-14
Author:
Sindre Glomnes

  • Method Details

    • addAddress

      public void addAddress​(Factory parent)
      Adds an address to the address register through the AddressDialog and updates the tableView list. Shows error alert if the address is a duplicate.
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of factory.

    • editAddress

      public void editAddress​(Address selectedAddress, Factory parent)
      Edits a selected address from the tableView through AddressDialog and updates the tableView list. shows error alert if a address is not selected from the tableView.
      Parameters:
      selectedAddress - Address to be edited.
      parent - Instance of factory.

    • removeAddress

      public void removeAddress​(Address selectedAddress, Factory parent)
      Removes a selected address from the register, and updates the tableView. Shows an error alert if a address is not selected from the tableview. Shows an confirmation alert for removing the address.
      Parameters:
      selectedAddress -
      parent -

    • importTxt

      public void importTxt​(Factory parent)
      Imports a txt file of addresses and adds them to the register. Clears the register from all previous addresses. Updates the tableView. Updates the statusbar to "Import successful"
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of Factory

    • exportTxt

      public void exportTxt​(Factory parent)
      Exports all addresses in the register to a txt file. Updates the statusbar.
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of Factory

    • importCsv

      public void importCsv​(Factory parent)
      Imports a csv file of addresses and adds them to the register. Clears the register from all previous addresses. Updates the tableView. Updates the statusbar to "Import successful"
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of Factory

    • exportCsv

      public void exportCsv​(Factory parent)
      Exports all addresses in the register to a csv file. Updates the statusbar.
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of Factory

    • error

      public void error​(java.lang.String e)
      Error alert used to showcase all exceptions useful to the user.
      Parameters:
      e - The exception message.

    • reset

      public void reset​(Factory parent)
      Resets the register. Removes all addresses and updates the tableView
      Parameters:
      parent - Instance of Factory
